ygData.subject: Re: New ex-rogue druid
ygData.msgSnippet: suer i can. First you are in the right place till you hit lvl 10, then you may want to get a port to Commons and get a bind at Freeport so if you die you will
ygData.messageBody:
suer i can. First you are in the right place till
you hit lvl 10, then you may want to get a port to
Commons and get a bind at Freeport so if you die you will
be close when you respawn. Then go to the Tunnel and
try to get in a Orc group till you are about lvl 13,
then go to NRO and get in Derv camps. That will keep
you busy for now. as for spells, you will find all of
the DD spells work well, and DOTS works good, Harmony
is important slo along with snare, NOT root. Root
just makes the mob hit harder. If you want to solo,
you can learn to kite. Let me know if you need help
learning to kite and I can help with that also. BTW what
server are you on in EQ? I am on the Tribunal. good luck
and Happy Hunting.
